[[File:MetalCoat.png|thumb|200px|The Metal Coat]]
==Details==
===Description=== The Metal Coat costs 2,500 [[Quest Points]]. It can be bought from the [[shops]] of [[Shops#Johto:_Locations_and_items|Olivine City]] in [[Johto]]. It can also be found after defeating Wild Skarmory.
===Uses=== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Pre-Evolution !! Evolution |- | Onix || | Steelix |- | Scyther || | Scizor |}
[[Category:Items]] [[Category:Evolution Items]]
